About Me

About Trevor...

BIO

My name is Trevor Clements

I am a software developer from Eugene, OR.

I enjoy physical activities such as weightlifting, skateboarding, and running.

I also love to break a 'mental sweat' with a game of chess, pondering the man/machine connection, or studying machine learning.

I am a hobbyist musician, and have grown to be quite fond of synthesizers.

Cascade Software Systems

Full Stack Developer

Enhancements, bug fixes, change orders, troubleshooting, customer support, social media management, A/V production.
